name: SailAway
description:
SailAway is a title that takes place in the vast oceans with many islands to explore, places to go, a treasure to find, enemies to fight, or just spend time relaxing and admiring the beautiful landscape of the islands!

You can download the public alpha version of the game right here. Be sure to join our discord to share suggestion, post bug reports, get frequent updates and polls for the games or just chill and talk with other people!
